message: Let's start with a fair split. Accept and we can end the game early!
You wanted a fair split, but I think I deserve more for taking the risk of negotiating with you!
You think you deserve more? I'm willing to give you a decent share, but I'm not going to get taken advantage of!
You think I'm trying to take advantage of you? I'm willing to meet you halfway and make it a 50/50 split. What do you say?
